plot: Manoel de Oliveira directs José Régio's historical epic of religious and political power struggles.  King Sebastiao plans to make Portugal the world's Fifth Empire.
title: O Quinto Império - Ontem Como Hoje
plot_es: Manoel de Oliveira directs José Régio's historical epic of religious and political power struggles.  King Sebastiao plans to make Portugal the world's Fifth Empire.
original_name: O Quinto Império - Ontem Como Hoje
plot_en: Manoel de Oliveira directs José Régio's historical epic of religious and political power struggles.  King Sebastiao plans to make Portugal the world's Fifth Empire.
